it.unige.dibris.TExpRVMAS.core.decentralized

Class Partition<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unige.dibris.TExpRVMAS.core.decentralized.Partition<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Set<T>>

    public class Partition<T>
extends Object
implements Iterable<Set<T>>
    Class representing a partition of agents used to obtain the decentralized runtime verification of a JADE MAS
    Author:
    angeloferrando

        maxSize - is the maximum number of elements in the constraints
        Returns:
        the number of constraint with at least minSize and at most maxSize elements

        IllegalArgumentException - if minSize > maxSize

        elem1 - first set of elements
        elem2 - second set of elements
        Returns:

      • addConstraint

        public <E extends T> void addConstraint(E elem1,
                                        E elem2)
        Add a new constraint inside the partition. If one of (or both) element belongs already to a constraint it will be done a fusion of constraints.
        Parameters:
        elem1 - first element
        elem2 - second element
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if elem1 or elem2 are null
